name: Clumsy Climber (itch)
description:
Clumsy Climber is clumsy!

Click and drag the hands to the pegs to make Clumsy Climber climb. Climb to the top!

Looking for extra challenge? There are 12 coins to find throughout the game (4 in each level). Collect them all!

Created over 8 week-nights and weekend days.

Updates:

  • v1.02.05: game balance fixes, it's slightly easier now.
  • v1.02: audio improvement, added toggle sound on/off button
  • v1.01: New climber model.
